structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIIF. ZERO LOT LINE DEVELOPMENTS (ZLL)

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.42. Districts in which permitted.
A zero lot line development, with a maximum of six (6) units per net acre, for one (1) family dwelling only, may be permitted in the RU-1Z, RU-2, RU-TH, RU-3, RU-3M, RU-4, RU-4A, RU-4L and RU-4M Districts without a public hearing upon approval of the site plan(s) by the Department and upon compliance with all other specified conditions in this article. A zero lot line development with greater than six (6) units per net acre shall require a public hearing before the Community Zoning Appeals Board. Where the regulations included herein conflict with regulations included in the individual districts or other sections of, the regulations included herein shall apply.
